```{r}
library(arrow)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
pq_brut <- open_dataset(here::here("res", "sim_module.arrow"), format = "arrow")
df <- pq_brut %>%
  collect()
colnames(df)
```

```{r}
df %>%
  pivot_longer(c(stab_com, sync, avg_cv_sp), names_to = "stab", values_to =
  "values") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = module, y = values, color = as.factor(alphaij))) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_grid(
    rows = vars(stab),
    scales = "free_y")
```
